articles.content: The broader indices underperformed the main indices in the week ended June 28 despite the smallcap index hitting a record high, with 60 smallcaps delivering double-digit returns (see the chart below)… [+4920 chars]

articles.title: Flipkart launches payments app, Super.money, in fintech push - TechCrunch
articles.description: Indian e-commerce giant Flipkart has quietly started rolling out a payments app, dubbed Super.money, as it broadens its fintech ambitions.
